subject: Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: A friend-of-the-court brief says the settlement between the N.F.L. and retired players does not cover the full range of disorders linked to brain trauma.
snippet: A friend-of-the-court brief says the settlement between the N.F.L. and retired players does not cover the full range of disorders linked to brain trauma.
